IXO RAM548 Ford Fiesta WRC 2013 Rally México 7th Place K. Block/A. Gelsomino

Purchased: 2014
Manufacturer page: http://ixomodels.com/index.php/car/popup/1962

Ken Block and Alex Gelsomino finished 7th in Rally México. This was Block's only WRC event in 2013 but it was his best-ever WRC finish. Another example of great VFM from IXO.
